JUSTICE P.SOMARAJAN FRIDAY, THE O8TH DAY OF JANUARY 2021 / 18TH POUSHA, 1942 Crl.MC.No.3651 OF 2020(F) CRIME NO.1401/2019 OF VARKALA POLICE STATION , THIRUVANANTHAPURAM PETITIONERS /ACCUSED NO.1 TO 3: 1 NEELIMA SUSEELAN PILLAI, AGED 32 YEARS, D/O. SRI.M.R.SASITH RESPONDENTS: 1 STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERLA, ERNAKULAM PIN-682 031. 2 MOHANAKUMARAN NAIR, AGED 62 YEARS S/O.KRISHNA PILLAI, AYILIYAM, JANARDANAPURAM, VARKALA PIN-695 141. 3 THE SUB INSPECTOR, VARKALA POLICE STATION, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM-695 141. R2 BY ADV. SRI.BLAZE K.JOSE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI.M.R.DHANIL THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 08.01.2021, ALONG WITH Crl1.MC.1520/2020(H), THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: oS Da Crl.MC.No.3651 OF 2020(F) 2 2021/KER/1264 ORDER The offences alleged are under Sections 420,406, 465,467, 468,471,34 of IPC. The mtter is settled out of court. Defacto complainant filed a sworn statement in that behalf. Hence it will not serve any purpose, if it is proceeded further. The entire proceedings are hereby quashed. The Crl.M.C. is allowed accordingly. Sd/- P.
